name: funsketch
description:
an experimental application that has simple drawing features, as well as some interesting filter and brush options. more importantly, you can also make some quick, simple animations!
try it here: https://syncopika.github.io/funSketch/ also, I tried out the floodfill feature using web workers here! It looks like they definitely help speed up performance.
### problems to fix / things to do: - when rotating, the coordinates where the paintbrush strikes when mousedown get changed.
